name: Night Dream
description:
So this is a prototype for a puzzle platformer. It's going to be centered around four key types of puzzles:

-Logic Gate Puzzles

-World Looping Puzzles (inspired by the game Manifold Garden)

-Light beam Puzzles

-Portal puzzles

It's also a prototype in terms of artwork, as I am going for an abstract style. The idea is to have 4 different worlds, each with their own artstyle:

-Gardens

-Full Abstract (black and white)

-Sunken cities

-City (Vaporwave style)

11/03/2017 Update:

We are still up and running, by the way. Making levels, making progress! Couple of screenshots of new levels were added!
